name: symmetropolis: the no lemon no melon campaign!
name_original: symmetropolis: the no lemon no melon campaign!
description:
will you help the syms of symmetropolis in their NO LEMON NO MELON campaign to restore symmetry? visual warnings: if the kaleidoscope background on level 2 is too distressing to look at, you can press the backspace key to replace it with clouds. fullscreen mode recommended (the icon in the bottom-right corner of the game area)

this game was created in four days during the 47th godot wild jam, using the following free & open source tools: godot engine, milkytracker, libresprite, inkscape, audacity.

the music and "unusual looking" art were made by me. other assets + shaders used under cc0 or mit licenses.

share your best times in the comments! :)

(there may or may not be an exploit to get really competitive times. can you beat.. 13 seconds?!)
